description:
A CAD tool for extracting bits from Mask ROM photographs.


1. Gatorom's solver-set option now uses descriptive filenames.
2. GUI can now export a set of solved results with File/Export/SolverSetBytes.
3. Clearer selection rectangle.
4. R and C will now draw the correct line type when the user confuses them.
5. ^H now sets the home position.
6. Zooming and movement keys now work in the second view.
7. Perfectly duplicate lines are now culled during DRC by the V key. Previously, these duplicate lines were very hard to remove.
8. Rows and columns are now stored as sorted lists instead of sets.
9. Rows and columns are now in a consistent order in the file export.
10. Performance boosts in bit marking, background bit marking and alignment.
11. Universal binary for macOS.
12. RomAlignerTilting works better for designs with a gap between banks.
13. Out-of-view bits are no longer drawn during dragging, speeding up adjusting groups of long lines.
